Description: 2 bed, 1 Bath townhouse on a dead-end street. Large open plan kitchen and living room. Private in unit laundry with plenty of basement storage space. Master bedroom has a double closet. Amenities include: Central AC, New high efficiency heating and hot water system (gas), Hardwood floors throughout, large shared yard, Off-Street parking, Fully insulated and each room is wired for cable TV & Internet. Easy walk to new Tufts Green line or bus around the corner to Davis & Harvard. 5-minute walk to Whole Foods and a Starbucks.
